title: Bump gazebo docker image versions from release.py

content.raw:
Just like we update the homebrew fomulae when we release new packages (pull request #125), we should update the package versions in the gazebo docker images as well. This could automate the following pull request:

* https://github.com/osrf/docker_images/pull/35

Note that the pull request should update the version tag in the platform.yaml files and then run some scripts to populate the Dockerfiles.

cc: @ruffsl
